title: MTV SPORTS
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052945im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/47883.jpg)   
   
the R is simmilar to DSO1 Lane.
author: adriano

comments.content:
Not quite it, but ' [Virna](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052945/http:/www.fsd.it/fonts/virna.htm)', by [Fabrizio Schiavi](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052945/http:/www.fsd.it/), would be an even nicer alternate.. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052945im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
_( It actually also has been created especially for MTV.. )_
Actually there must be an alternative font (variation) that has full glyph (without the 2 line glyph that is). I only managed to take a photo of the end of the show where it presents this variation.
It looks like something from T26...
